'''Hyakunin Ikki''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/10/10 10:00 - 2022/10/24 03:59

===Requirements===
* Adventure Rank 30 or above
* Complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

===Summary===
* During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Talent Level-Up Material]]s, and [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s.
*To access the event, players must enter its domain on an island south-west of [[Inazuma City]] (seen below.)
* There are a total of six challenges in "Hyakunin Ikki," and a new challenge will be unlocked each day for the first six days of the event.
* You can use the trial characters provided or your own characters to form 6 tag teams and take part in the challenge.
* Each tag team can have up to two characters and two Secret Arts. Secret Arts can provide buffs to the team on the field.
* The event challenges are not available in Co-Op Mode.
* Although there are no additional rewards for completing a given challenge with over 2000 points, platinum medals are awarded for the following. Achieving platinum medals will also add a flaming animation on the score screen at the end of the challenge.
**[[File:Icon Hyakunin Ikki Medal 4a.png|27px]] Platinum: Kongou Lion (3000+ points)
**[[File:Icon Hyakunin Ikki Medal 4b.png|27px]] Platinum: Magatsu no Mikoto (4500+ points)
**[[File:Icon Hyakunin Ikki Medal 4c.png|27px]] Platinum: Zaou (6000+ points)
